Sun, 15 Sep 2024 21:53:15 +0000 Snapper inside FloMo, in which a boat drags a long, flexible tube to catch fish instead of using trawl nets. Photo / FloMo
Murdering mother Lauren Dickason posts tribute to slain children to mark three years since they died https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/murdering-mother-lauren-dickason-posts-tribute-to-slain-children-to-mark-third-years-since-they-died/TZ57QOPRGZGIRBDWLJGFMHH6NU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/murdering-mother-lauren-dickason-posts-tribute-to-slain-children-to-mark-third-years-since-they-died/TZ57QOPRGZGIRBDWLJGFMHH6NU/ Convicted Timaru mother marks the third anniversary of her children's deaths. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 21:39:51 +0000 Lauren Dickason appears for sentencing in the High Court at Christchurch for the murder of her three children. Photo / Pool
Pasifika Festival in the Bay brings sounds of the Pacific to Katikati College https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/pasifika-festival-in-the-bay-brings-sounds-of-the-pacific-to-katikati-college/ SSMK5OPURA3RFQMPZSISY7HTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/pasifika-festival-in-the-bay-brings-sounds-of-the-pacific-to-katikati-college/ SSMK5OPURA3RFQMPZSISY7HTI/ About 35 groups from schools around the Bay will perform at Katikati College. Philip Polkinghorne trial live updates: Crown to deliver closing addresshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-trial-live-updates-crown-to-deliver-ending-address/4FEHUNEWDJBWLBNGIKJP7RS2YE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-trial-live-updates-crown-to-deliver-ending-address/4FEHUNEWDJBWLBNGIKJP7RS2YE/ Craig Kapitan, George BlockThe eye surgeon is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna at their Remuera home. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 21:30:00 +0000 Auckland Crown Solicitor Alysha McClintock delivers the opening address for the prosecution on July 29, the first day of the murder trial of Philip Polkinghorne, pictured behind his lawyers Ron Mansfield KC (left) and Harrison Smith. Forty-nine days later, McClintock is today set to deliver the Crown's closing address. Photo / Michael Craig
